name: DaGame (SamApp)
description:
Information

Dababy has to go to his fortnut concert but there is sooo much traffic, play as DaBaby as he passes through many obstacles 

Controls -

A - Down

D - Up

There will be more updates in the future, this is a really early build and I want suggestions on what I can improve.

Update Log - Ver. 021

- Fixed Bugs

- Updated UI

- Sound Effects and Background Music

- Timer
